comments:
While entering a valid style property value (with an element already using this style), errors are logged until the value is a complete match with a valid value. For example, while entering "bold" for the property value "font-weight", individual errors are logged for the values "b", "bo", and "bol"; once the value is completely and correctly entered as "bold", there is no error logged.
